isis.stitle: 10 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RTLO SERIES - ASSEMBLE - SPLITTER CYLINDER ASSEMBLY

svcproc.title: SPLITTER CYLINDER ASSEMBLY
svcproc.para: Apply Eaton lubricant #71214 supplied with the O-ring kit to all shift cylinder assembly and insert valve O-rings so a film covers the entire surface of each O-ring.
Apply Eaton rust preventative #71213 or equivalent to all shift cylinder walls and yoke bars. Cover the entire yoke bar surface that comes in contact with the shift cylinder O-ring.

Apply Eaton lockwire #1619 or equivalent to the shift yoke bolts. The lockwire should anchor each bolt head securely to the yoke or to the second bolt which fastens to the yoke bar. The lockwire should be twisted together, trimmed, and bent out of the way of other parts.

step1.para: Install the small O-ring in the cylinder housing bore ( Figure 189).

figure.caption: Figure 189. Splitter Cylinder Assembly - O-ring In Bore

step1.para: Install the piston O-ring on the piston O.D. ( Figure 190).

figure.caption: Figure 190. Piston O-ring On Piston O.D.

step1.para: Place the auxiliary housing upright in a vise ( Figure 191).
Position a new gasket on the cylinder housing mounting surface ( Figure 191).
From the rear, with the air passage towards the rear bearing cover, install the cylinder housing ( Figure 191).
From the rear, insert the piston. Make it flush with the cylinder housing ( Figure 192).
Install the insert valve in the cylinder cover bore, nipple end in the proper direction ( Figure 193).

figure.caption: Figure 193. Valve In Cylinder Cover Bore

step1.para: Install the insert valve retaining nut over the insert valve ( Figure 193). Tighten the retaining nut to 40 to 50 ft-lbs. (54 to 68 N•m) of torque.
Position a new gasket on the cylinder housing cover mounting surface ( Figure 194). The gasket air passage must align with the housing air passage.

figure.caption: Figure 194. New Gasket On Cylinder Housing Cover

step1.para: Position the splitter cylinder cover over the gasket ( Figure 195).

figure.caption: Figure 195. Splitter Cylinder Cover Over Gasket

step1.para: Apply Eaton/Fuller sealant #71205 or Loctite 242 to the retaining bolts.
Install and tighten the retaining bolts to 20 to 25 ft-lbs. (27 to 34 N•m) of torque.
